flawed_nl_solution:
Tammy picks 10 trees x 12 oranges/tree = <<10*12=210>>210 oranges per day.
Tammy sells 210 oranges/day / 6 oranges/pack = <<210/6=35>>35 6-packs of oranges a day
Tammy sells 35 packs/day x 7 days/week = <<35*7=245>>245 6-packs a week
In 3 weeks Tammy sells 245 packs/week x 3 weeks = <<245*3=735>>735 6 -packs
Tammy makes 735 packs x $2/pack = $<<735*2=1470>>1470
#### 1470

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 120, not 210. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
